Item.name: FPGA Circuit
Item.description: Field-programmable gate array - a multi-purpose circuit which can be reconfigured for use in a large variety of electrical devices.

Item.name: And Component
Item.description: Sends a signal when both inputs receive a signal within a set period of each other.

Item.name: Or Component
Item.description: Sends a signal if either of the inputs receive a signal.

Item.name: Not Component
Item.description: Sends a signal when the input is NOT receiving a signal.

Item.name: Relay Component
Item.description: When switched on, forwards all received signals from the input connections to the outputs.

Item.name: Delay Component
Item.description: Delays all received signals for a specific amount of time.

Item.name: Oxygen Detector
Item.description: Sends out a value between 0-100 depending on the quality of the surrounding air.

Item.name: Water Detector
Item.description: Sends out a signal when the detector is submerged.

Item.name: Smoke Detector
Item.description: Sends out a signal when it senses smoke.

Item.name: Motion Detector
Item.description: Sends out a signal when it detects movement.

Item.name: Signal Check Component
Item.description: Sends a signal when a signal matching a specific value is received.

Item.name: RegEx Find Component
Item.description: Sends a signal if the received signal matches a specific regular expression pattern.

Item.name: Oscillator
Item.description: Sends out a periodic, oscillating signal.

Item.name: Wifi Component
Item.description: Allows remote communication between other Wifi Components that are using the same channel.

Item.name: Camera
Item.description: Typically used in photonics masts to provide the crew with a high-resolution view of the area outside the sub.

Item.name: Camera
Item.description: Typically used in photonics masts to provide the crew with a high-resolution view of the area outside the sub.
